reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Local Cooperation Fund (LCF) in St. Lucia

description.narrative: Functionaries of education from Antigua and Barbuda Belize Dominica Greanda Saint Kitts and Nevis Saint Lucia Saint Vincent and the Grenadines the University of the West Indies (UWI) and the Caribbean Examinations Council (CXC) visit Finland on 5-8 Septemb er 2012. Familiarization with the Finnish educational system brings additional value to developing education in the Caribbean region. In addition to the countries the CXC and the UWI are the central actors in developing education in the region as is the Or ganization of Eastern Caribbean States (OECS) which supports the visit. The visit programme includes meetings at the Finnish National Board of Education visit to day-care centre comprehensive school upper secondary school as well as vocational education in stitution and visit to the Department of Teacher Education of the University of Helsinki.
